lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 2 (U.P.) -- WPB Vice Chairman William L. Batt expressed confidence today that Russia would be fighting next Winter, despite the fact that the United States and Britain had been able to send her only "too little" assistance.
abstract: W L Batt lauds USSR fight
snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 2 (U.P.) -- WPB Vice Chairman William L. Batt expressed confidence today that Russia would be fighting next Winter, despite the fact that the United States and Britain had been able to send her only "too little" assistance....
